3_19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa.body: @talnicrom: Though the bandwidth concerns may be reasonable over mobile networks, I can imagine the inherent caching could be very useful for the use case of researching things at home on a WiFi network; then going out into the wild and still having the cached sites with no mobile data access. Still new to this... so I may be missing things, but it seems exciting.
